akn:section.akn:heading: Coordination of advanced manufacturing research and development

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Interagency Committee The Director shall establish or designate a Committee on Technology under the National Science and Technology Council. The Committee shall be responsible for planning and coordinating Federal programs and activities in advanced manufacturing research and development. In furtherance of the Committee’s work, the Committee shall consult with the National Economic Council.
